page.title: 03Industry and Trade
page.content: While this is primarily an agricultural area, it does contain one of the largest employers in the Lisburn area - Barbour Campbell Threads Ltd.- as well as some small scale industry. There is a processing plant which stores eggs, beef and butter for the E.E.C. While this site is primarily a wholesale area there is a retail outlet for frozen food. In all the complex contains nine (9) warehouses and provides employment for sixty-five (65) people. There is a engineering workshop on a one acre site which employs eighteen (18) people and where almost anything can be made to order out of steel. There is also a civil engineering plant which employs twenty (20) people. It carries out demolition work, repairs roads, builds reservoirs and hires out farm machinery
